Translations.Text: Ur Ieemmel ara Oebbi nnaalat, siwa seg win ipwadensen. Oebbi Izga Issel, d Amusnaw
Ma txedmem lxio ainani, ne$ teffrem t, ne$ tsemmeem abekkavu, Oebbi Izga Ipsemmie, d Aeernuk
Ih, wid inekoen Oebbi akked imazanen iS, u b$an ad ssemfaoqen Oebbi akked imazanen iS, qqaoen: "numen s kra, nenkeo kra". B$an ad awin abrid garasen
Widak, d ijehliyen n uuee. Nhegga, i ijehliyen, aaaqeb isdullun
Wid iumnen s Oebbi akked imazanen iS, ur ten ssemgarraden, widak, deqqal a ten id ias warraz nnsen. Oebbi Izga Ipsemmie, Ipeunu

La k d ssuturen, At Tezmamt, ad asen d tessersev Tazmamt seg igenni. Ni$ ssutren, i Musa, sennig waya. Nnan as: "ssenaat a$ d Oebbi, a T nwali". Tebbwi ten ssiaqa, ilmend n ddens nnsen. Sinna, aabden aajmi, mbaad ma iusa ten id ubeggen. Nesemmee asen aya. Nefka, i Musa, adabu n uuee
Nessuli adrar sennig sen, ilmend n laaqed nnsen. Nenna yasen: "kecmet si tebburt s lekni". Nenna yasen: "ur txalafet ssebt". Neiief segsen laaqed iueeean
